en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Celebrity Wedding in Bangkok!
en.content:
FusionExcel recently sponsored the wedding of Miss Paporn Tangtrogjita and Mr Sunpakorn Sriwuttiwng (Son of Dr Kraiwat Sriwuttiwong, FusionExcel Thailand Country Licensee Advisory Board Member and Owner of Thai TV Stations), at the Royal Thai Navy Convention Hall, Thonburi, Bangkok on 27th November 2008.

The wedding was attended by 500 distinguished guests including Mr Pramuan (Former Minister), Mr Preedee Hirauyapruk (Former Senator), Colonel Narong Kittikajorn (Son of General Thanom, Former PM Thailand).

During the event, FusionExcel's Qunatum Pendant were presented to 50 famous celebrities, including the famous band "Soonthrapiorn" and to H.E. Air Vice Marshal Kamthorn Sindhavanandra and his wife. FusionExcel Thailand Advisory Board President, General Dato Kitti Ratachahaya presented the Quantum Pendants.

Mr Don Chan, FusionExcel's Country Licensee was the MC for the evening.

meta.description: FusionExcel recently sponsored the wedding of Miss Paporn Tangtrogjita and Mr Sunpakorn Sriwuttiwng (Son of Dr Kraiwat Sriwuttiwong) at the Royal Tahi Navy Convention Hall, Thonburi, Bangkok on 27th November 2008.
